phrases: This is a world of magic.
Magic is bought and sold here every day, and is an integral part of people's daily lives.
Wizards, those who use magic in order to make a living,
belong to various guilds, and perform jobs on commission.
And in a certain city, there lies a certain guild.
A guild from which various legends were once born...
Or rather, will continue to be born long into the future...
Those who call themselves wizards shall never neglect sharpening their skills!
They shall polish their techniques, and perform jobs on request!
And they must earn their daily bread!
For as there be sunny days, surely there be rainy ones!
For as there be days in which work is finished without trouble,
surely there be days which are naught but an uphill struggle!
No matter what happens, tomorrow will always come!
And we shall continue to walk the path, as wizards!
That is what it means to be a Fairy Tail wizard!
Everyone, you have worked really hard this past year!
And so, in honor of your hard work, tomorrow will be the long-awaited...
And today we will have a pre-celebration!
Everyone, please take it easy since tomorrow's the real deal.
So everyone is saying drink, drink just'because it is hanami time?
Is not everyone getting a little too excited?
It is like you are at a hanami all year!
If you are a Man, then look at cherry blossoms!
Dad, I am counting on you to win the grand prize at bingo this year!
It was no use last year or the one before that...
Okay then... I am going to do my best at bingo, too!
Uh, how is that work exactly?
I do not get these people.
Everyone is acting like their heads are in the clouds.
It is just cherry blossom season, sheesh!
The people making requests realize it.
There are not many requests since everyone knows that Fairy Tail's
too busy partying to do much work.
Hey, how about you go on a job, huh?
Gray-sama went off on a job!
Juvia cannot believe how lonely the guild is without Gray-sama here!
He is a Fairy Tail wizard!
Well, Gray's formed a team with Natsu and the others, so that is just how it is.
But they took Wendy and Carla with them!
It is so they can get used to our guild's jobs,
since they just transferred from Cait Shelter.
Juvia knows... but she is sad!
Gate of the Clock, I open thee!
I ended up here in light clothes again...
Then I will take you up on that offer...
I am perfectly fine, thank you.
Personally, I think cold is something you can manage if you mentally prepare yourself.
The weather seems to be clearing.
I want to go home now!
It is hard to walk when it is piled up this high.
You think there really is an herb as useful as that?
The request bill said it was here, so it probably is, you know?
But the part about how steeping it as a tea or baking it into a cake
can temporarily magnify a wizard's magic power,
I think that is just a bunch of malarkey.
You know what they say: there is always a tasty fish to catch!
You mean to say there is always a catch.
Whether or not it is effective, the request was to gather the herb from this mountain.
And if we gather quite a lot, we can use it as a prize for tomorrow's bingo.
If you are out there, say something!
Do not just say whatever pops into your head!
And I do not even know what the hell you are saying, idiot!
You are going to get it, Prince Frostbite Boxers!
Shut the hell up, you whiny little flicker!
I wish we could hurry this job up and go home...
I want to get ready for the hanami tomorrow.
I am really looking forward to it, myself!
The sakura in Magnolia are really beautiful!
And what is more, at nighttime the cherry blossoms become rainbow-colored!
It is even beautiful imagining it!
and beneath the rainbow sakura they stare up all day long,
and everyone livens it up for a grand hanami!
Man, I cannot wait until tomorrow!
That is why I want to hurry up and finish this job, get back to Magnolia,
and then, and then bake cookies... and then, and then choose the clothes I will wear...
And then, and then I will go straight to bed without writing my novel...
And then, and then I will do my hair up nice and cute...
Lucy-san, did you go to the hanami last year?
I was pretty sure I heard that it has not been a year since you joined the guild...
I guess this is my first time.
I think I dreamed I was there from being too excited about it!
It really does sound like a blast.
I cannot wait for it, either!
It will be so exciting to look at the cherry blossoms with everyone else from the guild.
Let us enjoy them together, as fellow first-timers!
You two should go search now!
That is definitely the smell of herbs.
Just as good a nose as usual.
Have you ever smelled these herbs before?
Never smelled'them, but I am sure.
Man, who lit his butt on fire?
His nose is nothing to sneeze at.
Maybe it is my imagination, but I have a really bad feeling about this.
Your instincts are usually correct, Carla.
Let us pick these and get home.
Also known as a White Wyvern.
A monster that lives on Mt. Hakobe.
Contrary to its appearance, it is herbivorous.
By the way, its favorite food is these herbs.
You want to keep'them all to yourself?!
We can kill two birds with one stone.
You know that the scales of a White Wyvern sell for a pretty penny?
After we get those herbs, we will strip all its scales off!
you all go and gather the herbs!
Is not this the most dangerous job of all?
Do not sound like such a wimp!
Dazzling Blaze of the Fire Dragon!
Uh, how about a little, you know...
This thing's more powerful than we thought!
Okay, then... I am not going to lose, either!
Iron Fist of the Fire Dragon!
I am one of the members of Fairy Tail's strongest team!
Well, that is what we get for making all that commotion.
Today is the day of the hanami.
The cherry blossoms in Magnolia are pretty, you know!
I was really looking forward to it...
Cannot you tell just by looking at me?
Sorry... I am going to sleep...
It is too bad she caught a cold, after she was looking forward to it so much.
This will be the first hanami for Lucy, will not it?
Hanami is where everyone drinks and eats and has a party while looking at the sakura blossoms.
You are makin' too much of a fuss about it.
But Magnolia has those rainbow sakura that are supposed to be really beautiful, right?
When I came to Magnolia, I totally could not wait to go see them!
Now everyone, eat up all you want!
No one's going to take it, sheesh.
I do not get what that means.
Her nose is all runny, and her face is flushed...
Why did she catch a cold?
You do not get it, do you?
Even though Lucy-san was looking forward to it so much...
Why do not you cure her with your magic, Wendy?
She will be fine again by tomorrow, but...
I bet everyone is having a lot of fun now...
I sure wish I could have gone...
And now, we will begin the traditional hanami bingo tournament!
We have got a bunch of high quality prizes again this year!
Everyone, give it everything you got!
Then, please punch out the center circle!
I am going to get the top prize, for sure!
Now that I think about it, it has not even been a year, has it?
I ran away from home, trying to join Fairy Tail, my dream guild...
And that is how I met Natsu.
Being a man has nothing to do with it.
Natsu, you do not want to play bingo?
In just a short time, there is been so much over-the-top stuff...
I am just one away from 3 different bingos!
Erza, you are the first bingo!
Even luck can come from training!
It is the herbs that are rumored to temporarily increase one's magic power!
Those are the herbs we picked!
And they are already dried up!
Probably'because we took them suddenly to a warm climate.
A whole lot happened, that is for sure...
And in my way, I think I have done my best to deal with it...
I are not even got one hit yet!
That is'because your skills are rusty!
I have a feeling there is no way I will win.
Your intuition is usually correct, Carla...
The prizes are going to be gone soon.
I was hoping to at least bring Lucy a present...
Then I will give the prize to whoever makes me laugh the most with a single gag.
The prize is a pair of tickets to a fancy hotel at Akane Resort for 3 days and 2 nights!
I will give it as a present to my sister!
Together with Gray-sama for 3 days and 2 nights?
Juvia's heart is not ready for such...
Truly a one-shot battle on the edge.
And that means it is my turn, partner.
You are not even close to a bingo!
It seemed my heart would break countless numbers of times...
We got into some crazy trouble...
There were enemies more powerful than I could have ever imagined...
But because he and everyone in the guild were always there for me...
Well, a whole lot happened, that is for sure.
But I am sure that is it.
Though everyone holds their own tough times inside them...
Even so, everyone is trying to move forward, I am sure of it.
That is what Fairy Tail is.
I have really joined a great place here.
Which one of you dug up one of the city's precious sakura trees, huh?!
Something just flashed across my mind.
No, it is like, a premonition.
I have a feeling that something bad might happen...or it might not...
Next time: Wendy's first big job!
I am sure I have heard that line before...
